details.description: **Assigned courses**: Programming Foundations, Data Structure and Algorithm, Discrete Mathematics, Software Engineering Project
points: Provided assistance, evaluated performance, and delivered constructive feedback to a total of over 50 students
Created and graded assignments, conducted assistance sessions

**Relevant courses**: Data Structures & Algorithms, Platform Based Programming, Advanced Programming, Software Engineering, Databases, Human-Computer Interaction, Algorithms Design & Analysis, Web Service & Web Application, Computer Network, etc.
**Final Project**: [Development of Mobile Application for Kangaroo Mother Care for Low Birth Babies.](https://lib.ui.ac.id/detail?id=9999920541918&lokasi=lokal)

details.description: Nothelferkurs am Bahnhof provides first aid courses for driving licenses and corporate first aid training across Switzerland
points: Maintained the [Nothelferkurs am Bahnhof](https://www.nothelferambahnhof.ch/) website and admin dashboard
Developed a visual editor for managing website content.
Tech stack: React, Next.js, Prisma, PostgreSQL

details.description: Good Doctor Technology (Good Doctor) is a technology-based integrated healthcare provider.
points: Collaborated in the Commerce and Payment squad, developed internal admin dashboard, Merchant Portal, and the main Good Doctor client web application.
Tech stack: Next.js, Redux, RTK Query, Storybook, TypeScript

details.description: Female Daily Network is a Media Platform catering to all things beauty, on a mission to revolutionize the way Indonesian women discover, share and buy beauty products and services.
points: Collaborated in the Commerce Squad to develop and maintain the [e-Commerce website for Female Daily](https://studio.femaledaily.com) using Next.js, Javascript, and Redux
Improved code readability and maintainability, enhanced performance, and improved user experience, of an internal web application using Next.js, TypeScript, and React Query
Created components and Storybook documentation for the internal Female Daily components library
